# Democratising FinTech Data through Visual Analytics

### An interactive exploration of Customer Retention & Ecosystem Cash Flow

Our project application, **FinRetain**, aims to uncover hidden behavioral patterns, predict churn risk, and map macroeconomic fund flows using advanced visual analytics techniques. Built for **ISSS608 Visual Analytics**, Academic Year 2025-2026.
